name: AngerDark
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
AngerDark is a classic 2d platformer with dynamic destruction of the dark inhabitants of the endless forest. Do not let them stop you!

In an abandoned system, there is one habitable planet covered with thick impassable forest that no one was able to explore, the scientific coalition sends droids to it and who knows what they encounter there ...

Kill enemies alone or with a friend

★ Simple and beautiful graphics
★ Retro style
★ Original Soundtrack
★ Several types of weapons
★ Retro Co-op on 1 board!
★ Classic platformer
